mapper.select: SELECT b.BOARD_SEQ, b.MEMBER_SEQ, b.CATEGORY, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.WRITE_DATE, b.READ_COUNT, b.IMAGE, b.CV_START_DATE, b.CV_END_DATE, b.FILE_NAME, b.DEL, b.BOARD_AUTH, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.COMPANY_LOGO, b.CAREER, b.EDUCATION, b.WORKING_TYPE, b.SALARY, b.POSITION, b.WORKING_LOCATION, b.WEB_URL FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_SEQ = m.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE b.DEL = 0 AND b.BOARD_AUTH = 3 AND b.CV_END_DATE > NOW();

SELECT b.BOARD_SEQ, b.MEMBER_SEQ, b.CATEGORY, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.WRITE_DATE, b.READ_COUNT, b.IMAGE, b.CV_START_DATE, b.CV_END_DATE, b.FILE_NAME, b.DEL, b.BOARD_AUTH, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.COMPANY_LOGO, b.CAREER, b.EDUCATION, b.WORKING_TYPE, b.SALARY, b.POSITION, b.WORKING_LOCATION, b.WEB_URL FROM BOARD b JOIN MEMBER m ON b.MEMBER_SEQ = m.MEMBER_SEQ WHERE b.DEL = 0 AND b.BOARD_AUTH = 3 AND b.BOARD_SEQ = #{empBoardSeq} AND b.CATEGORY = 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(MEMBER_SEQ, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, IMAGE, CV_START_DATE, CV_END_DATE, FILE_NAME, DB_FILE_NAME, DEL, BOARD_AUTH, CAREER, EDUCATION, WORKING_TYPE, SALARY, POSITION, WORKING_LOCATION) VALUES(#{memberSeq}, 1, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), 0, "", #{cvStartDate}, #{cvEndDate}, #{fileName}, #{dbFileName}, 0, 3, #{career}, #{education}, #{workingType}, #{salary}, #{position}, #{workingLocation})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CV_START_DATE = #{cvStartDate}, CV_END_DATE=#{cvEndDate}, CAREER=#{career}, EDUCATION = #{education}, WORKING_TYPE= #{workingType}, SALARY = #{salary}, POSITION = #{position}, WORKING_LOCATION=#{workingLocation}, CONTENT = #{content}, WRITE_DATE = NOW() WHERE BOARD_SEQ = #{boardSeq};
